Sorry you were out when I called you this morning,
but I talked with Harry and he informed me that there
was nothing new on the utilization kit proposal to the
U. S. Office, As I told him, I had heard off the record
that it was going to be funded and that John Meany would
be getting in touch with us, I am anxious to find out
what they have in mind. I sincerely hope they do not
wash out utilization proposals in light of the contract
they have awarded the University of Nebraska,
Enclosed with this note is the bill from Marguerite
on the expenses for the NAEB utilization kit. There is
still some work to be done on this kit but I'm not sure
how much.
We have been very busy here trying to get our subur¬
ban school program project over the hill. I have had to
set the NAEB utilization kit project aside. However, now
I feel the pressure lessening a bit and we can get back
to pulling something together.
CJ/dir R. Tettemer
/Director of School
r Programs & Research
